## R Markdown

# Bel Air Midway
```{r cars}
### filter data for belair/midway

race_and_income_stats <- readRDS("shiny_app/data/race_and_income_combined.rds")


### all rds
all_income <- read_csv("baltcity_percap_income.csv")

belair_midway <- race_and_income_stats %>%
  filter(Neighborhood == "Belair-Edison" | 
        Neighborhood == "Midway/Coldstream") %>%
  st_drop_geometry()

sheet_write(belair_midway, "https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1z4lPLZ2GNOyiMB3GVNDYVjpM3Ggnp3PEuVIwwvnSrGA/", sheet="Sheet1")
  
st_write(belair_midway, "data_for_viz/belair_midway.geojson")

st_write(race_and_income_stats, "data_for_viz/race_and_income_stats.geojson")



```
